title: A Tough Start in Texas Turned Jimmy Butler Into an NBA All-Star
description: Butler is impossible to miss as the fiercely competitive star of the Miami Heat. But he got his start at a small junior college in Texas after bigger schools overlooked him.
dc:creator: Scott Cacciola
media:credit: Cooper Neill for The New York Times
media:description: The “Jimmy Butler Lobby” at Tyler Junior College in Texas includes photographs, magazine covers and an old jersey from the Miami Heat’s Butler, who played at the school for one season.
